com.sitewhere.spi.scheduling

Interface ISchedule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IMetadataProvider, IMetadataProviderEntity, ISiteWhereEntity, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Schedule

    public interface ISchedule
extends IMetadataProviderEntity, java.io.Serializable
    Represents a named schedule that can be applied to system actions.

    • Method Summary
